original_text: I also want the women to dress themselves properly in a way that is right. They should not bring shame on themselves. What makes a woman beautiful? It is not the special way that she prepares her hair. It is not the gold things or jewels that she wears. It is not her expensive clothes.
korean_text: 또 이와 같이 여자들도 단정하게 옷을 입으며 소박함과 정절로써 자기를 단장하고 땋은 머리와 금이나 진주나 값진 옷으로 하지 말고

sentences.original_text: I also want the women to dress themselves properly
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 또한 여성들이 자신을 단정하게 입기를 원합니다

sentences.original_text: in a way that is right
They should not bring shame on themselves
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 자신에게 부끄러움을 가져와서는 안 됩니다

sentences.original_text: It is not the special way that she prepares her hair
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 그녀가 머리를 특별하게 손질하는 방식이 아닙니다

sentences.original_text: It is not the gold things or jewels that she wears
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 그녀가 착용하는 금품이나 보석이 아닙니다

sentences.original_text: It is not her expensive clothes
